title: GIRL IN A DUFFEL BAG: 9-year-old girl’s body found stuffed in duffel
itunes:title: GIRL IN A DUFFEL BAG: 9-year-old girl’s body found stuffed in duffel
description:
When Trinity Love Jones was found partially stuffed in a duffel bag along a Los Angeles hiking trail, the 9-year-old girl had not even been reported missing. Her mother and her mom's boyfriend are now suspected in the child's death. Nancy Grace explores the disturbing case with a panel including forensics expert Karen Smith, psychologist Caryn Stark, North Carolina family & divorce lawyer Kathleen Murphy, and Crime Stories reporter John Lemley. Nancy also shares the Amber Alert for a missing Milwaukee 2-year-old girl. Little Noelani Robertson is believed to be with her father, who is on the run after allegedly murdering her mother.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
